word_mean: 核子：原子核的一种粒子，质子或中子

sentence.Network_en: The anomalous nucleon moments are due to hadronic effects.
sentence.Network_cn: 反常核子磁矩是由强子效应引起的.

sentence.Network_en: Some features of the nucleon structure emerges from these relations.
sentence.Network_cn: 从这些关系式中暴露出核子结构的某些特征.

sentence.Network_en: During its brief existence, the pion carries momentum from one nucleon to the other.
sentence.Network_cn: 在它短暂的存在期间内, 它将动量从一个核子带到另一个核子.
